title: Barnard College Plans to Offer Abortion Pills on Campus
description: It is one of many colleges and universities deliberating over how to respond to the overturning of Roe v. Wade.
dc:creator: Pam Belluck
media:credit: Robyn Beck/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images
media:description: Barnard officials said they will wait till next fall to make the pills available on campus in order to train staff, develop protocols and work out logistics.
